OK, if you were in X I'd tell you to use the GUI to select universe and multiverse but since you aren't   edit your /etc/apt/sources.list and lookm for a line that says  deb http://gb.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ breezy main       and make it    deb http://gb.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ breezy main universe restricted multiverse
Except yours probably doesn't say gb, your probably on a different mirror
Then do an apt-get update  to get the list of packages in universe and multiverse
